This creates a sense of fear and anxiety, causing people to act impulsively, without taking the time to verify the authenticity of the message.

Next, I exploit the human tendency to trust authority figures and established brands. This creates a sense of urgency and exclusivity, making people more likely to act quickly, without questioning the legitimacy of the offer.
